name: A Discord Of Darkness And Color
description:
A style for Discord. A bunch of stuff is customizable. If you want to go in the CSS itself and change it, the code has lots of comments that should make navigation incredibly easy. I would also recommend you download the style here if you aren't there already. https://33kk.github.io/uso-archive/?style=201433

Installing the style there lets you customize the stuff by clicking on the extension while downloading it on the userstyles website will just link you to the download page on the userstyles website (at least in my experience). It also loads way faster than the userstyles website.

Another thing is that light mode actually looks really good with this style! It always did but I just forgot to mention it.
additional_info:
Details On Every Customizable Thing Here:

Main Color: The main color that appears almost everywhere.

Friend List Bottom Color: In the friend list in the homepage, the style makes a gradient color there, the color here is the bottom of that gradient color.

Textbox: The background color of all the textboxes.

Background Image: The background image.

Background Extra: The background color of an extra background in the style that makes some parts darker. In the screenshot, this can be seen in the left sidebar and member list. The different values here are the opacity.

Borders: The color of the borders (and the shadow of the top bar).

Background Other: Some other backgrounds in the style, like the emoji pop-out.

Cover Background: The background that goes over the background image in order to make sure that it isn't too bright. You should change this depending on the background. The different values here are the opacity.

Friend List Gradient: On the friend list in the homepage, the style puts a gradient background there. Select either "yes" or "no" to select whether or not it appears.

Edit 1 (not counting all the other edits and experiments I did making the style settings): Fixed the video uploading picture thing that appears when you upload a video file

Edit 2: Fixed the inbox popout (the one that has the mentions and unreads lists)

Edit 3: Added transitions and differences in opacity in the channel links in the sidebar

Edit 4: Added a box shadow to the tabs in the mutual servers/friends list in the profile of someone, and styled some more buttons in the "multicolored buttons" section of the code

Edit 5: Added a transition to the messages in the search results

Edit 6: Fixed the "Add Friend" button

Edit 7: Fixed one of the "Cover Background" options in style settings. Selecting 0.7 as the opacity would end up selecting 0.5

Edit 8: Made it so messages with invite links have a background

Edit 9: Added another setting to the style settings (hopefully it works)

Edit 10: Fixed some stuff with the mentions and "Add Friend" button and also got better screenshots
